questions.question: Who was the leader of the Third Estate in 1789?
What was the main cause of the French Revolution?
What was the outcome of the Storming of the Bastille in 1789?

choices.choice: The release of prisoners and the end of absolute monarchy
The beginning of a new era of peace and prosperity

questions.question: Who was the leader of the Committee of Public Safety in 1793-1794?
What was the outcome of the Reign of Terror in 1793-1794?

choices.choice: The execution of King Louis XVI
The execution of thousands of people accused of counter-revolutionary activities
The end of the French Revolution
